::Lord Elder::
=A0
The Maximal shuttle reaches the Ark and sets down.
=A0
E=
lder: Is there a way for us to hack into the Maximal control system for the=
 Ark? Control it from our consoles here? Primal's equipment shouldn't be to=
o outdated.
=A0
The pilot looks over some thing.
=A0
Pilot: I think it can =
be done, sir. The problem is I'm a pilot. I don't know alot about this sort=
 of thing.
=A0
Elder: I'll try. Let me at the main console.
=A0
The pilot m=
oves as Elder sets to work.

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Elder::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The Maximal shuttle reaches the Ark and sets down.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: Is there a way for us to hack into the Maximal control system for the Ark? Control it from our consoles here? Primal's equipment shouldn't be too outdated.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The pilot looks over some thing.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Pilot: I think it can be done, sir. The problem is I'm a pilot. I don't know alot about this sort of thing.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: I'll try. Let me at the main console.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The pilot moves as Elder sets to work.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sat, 7/5/08, xochitla2006 <I><xochitla2006@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
